column1: Little Goat Diner////Little Goat exceeded expectations! In a city like Chicago
column3: but Little Goat's quirky and unique menu
column5: did not disappoint. I sat at the counter top and was able to watch a spectrum of mouth watering dishes come out of the kitchen
column6: making it next to impossible to decide on a meal. The staff was attentive and energetic
column7: so I never felt like i was waiting around for service. I ordered 'This Little Piggy Went to China'
column8: and I left full and satisfied. Definitely a must visit spot if you're ever in the west loop
